Medicine_tweet_24_p$Medicine_282_r$Medic.text:
Finding A: Meaning For emergency department patients who present with renal colic owing to ureteral stones smaller than 9 mm, tamsulosin does not appear to promote stone passage.
Finding B: Although the light of the half moon would likely be sufficient to illuminate the pollen, the full moon alone remains up throughout the entire night, so the researchers think that E. foeminiea maximizes the effect for efficiency.
Finding C: Poorer postoperative recovery in patients with lower functional health literacy!
Finding D: Our results indicate that drugs targeting α2 and α3GABA A receptors are well-suited to alleviate itch, including nonhistaminergic chronic itch for which currently no approved treatment exists.

Medicine_tweet_9_r$Medicine_98_r$Medicin.text:
Finding A: Longer breastfeeding is associated with improved cognition at age 3 and 7. Again, data are observational. #needrcts
Finding B: CONCLUSIONS: Our findings raise the prospect that the tissues harvested from equine ligaments up to 72 hours of post-mortem represent an available reservoir of specific stem cells.
Finding C: Pretty convincing evidence of negative selection detectable in cancer exomes in contrast to Martincorena et al Cell 2017. Nice eg in TERT w +ve selection in promoter but -ve selection in exons. Makes good sense!
Finding D: The researchers also made the observation of an increased risk of hyperactivity disorder among circumcised boys in non-Muslim families.

Finding A: This study builds on recent research focusing on fathers and their role in adolescent eating disorders treatment 32, [41] [42] [43] and finds that adolescents whose fathers engaged in weight conversations were significantly more likely to engage in dieting and UWCBs than adolescents whose fathers did not.
Finding B: They found that while it was associated with a lower risk of heart attacks and other cardiovascular events, it did lead to an increased risk of major bleeding.
Finding C: The #behaviour of overweight #dogs shows similarity with #personality traits of overweight humans [BIOLOGY (WHOLE ORGANISM)] BLet @username
Finding D: Can #CDK12 loss identify a subset (~7%) of mCRPC pts with #immunotherapy responsive tumors? Provocative study from #PCF #SU2C International #ProstateCancer Dream Team article via: @username

Finding A: No child had both SCQ and ADOS scores in the relevant ranges that would lead to an ASD diagnosis.
Finding B: Notwithstanding, our results indicate that, due to their unique attributes, lianas have the potential to severely reduce both the carbon sink potential and long-term carbon storage capacity of tropical forests.
Finding C: This study is the first direct demonstration of liana effects at the ecosystem scale and illustrates the important role of lianas in tropical forests, particularly with respect to carbon budgets.

Finding B: SPINART 3 year randomised study Tertiary Prophy vs On demand in adults with #haemophilia. With prophy 94% less bleeds. 1/3 no bleeds at all, 3/4 <2 bleeds per year. Higher quality of life. No change in MRI - bony changes are irreversible. #hemophilia
Finding C: The result, that trichromatic vision is more effective at breaking camouflage, seems to run counter to oft-quoted temperate forest trichromat temperate forest dichromat semi-arid desert trichromat semi-arid desert dichromat historical accounts of the military value of dichromatic observers and contemporary theories for the maintenance of visual pigment polymorphisms in many New World monkey species .
Finding D: Therefore, delivery of CSCs to discrete sites at the plasma membrane is critical for cellulose synthesis.

Finding A: Prisoners in 10-week #yoga course experienced improved behavioural control & decreased psychological distress:
Finding B: SPINART 3 year randomised study Tertiary Prophy vs On demand in adults with #haemophilia. With prophy 94% less bleeds. 1/3 no bleeds at all, 3/4 <2 bleeds per year. Higher quality of life. No change in MRI - bony changes are irreversible. #hemophilia
Finding C: The result, that trichromatic vision is more effective at breaking camouflage, seems to run counter to oft-quoted temperate forest trichromat temperate forest dichromat semi-arid desert trichromat semi-arid desert dichromat historical accounts of the military value of dichromatic observers and contemporary theories for the maintenance of visual pigment polymorphisms in many New World monkey species .
Finding D: Therefore, delivery of CSCs to discrete sites at the plasma membrane is critical for cellulose synthesis.
